segments.text: I'm just observing this kitchen scene unfolding right before me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The daylight streams in through that window, making everything seem so ordinary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But something is definitely not right with the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is just pouring out of it, a steady stream over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a widening puddle on the floor and cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands right there, focused intently on polishing a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed her foot is already in the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is utterly blank; she seems completely oblivious to the chaos building around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could lead to some serious water damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a remarkable display of absent-mindedness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll slip when she finally moves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer amount of water on the floor is concerning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This domestic scene is quickly becoming a minor disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She just keeps polishing, absolutely zoned out.
segments.speaker: PAR
